pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Nonparametric Methods Based on Spatial Signs and Ranks // Test and estimates of location, tests of independence, tests of sphericity and several estimates of shape all based on spatial signs, symmetrized signs, ranks and signed ranks. For details, see Oja and Randles (2004) doi:10.1214/088342304000000558 and Oja (2010) doi:10.1007/978-1-4419-0468-3.
